alert.note: Alert for Morrison (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 09 at 7:36PM CDT until July 09 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: The National Weather Service in the Twin Cities has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Morrison County in central Minnesota... * Until 815 PM CDT. * At 736 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Motley, or 19 miles west of Brainerd, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. At 729 PM, quarter size hail was reported in Motley. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Morrison County, including the following locations... Crow Wing State Park. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
